content.data:
[Y]Scene News Desk
[W]Fresh disks, fresh demos, fresh cheek.
[c][m.]
[W]Coders keep squeezing the CPC with
[W]sharper rasters and cleaner scrolling
[W]text.
[W]Small teams still ship clever ideas
[W]because they plan first and panic
[W]later.
[c][m.]
[G]- Demos are getting tighter.
[G]- Tools are getting friendlier.
[G]- Readers keep submitting hacks.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Mode 2 text pages still look brilliant
[C]on a green screen.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
